titleStmt.title: A new ballad intituled, the stout criple of Cornnwall wherein is shewed his dissolute life, and deserued death. To the tune of the blinde begger.
Stout cripple of Cornwall.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcock,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Of a stout cripple that kept the high way,".
An edition of: The stout cripple of Cornwall.
Place of publication supplied by cataloger; STC estimates 1628-1629 as publication date.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
